QuestData.Title: Trapping the Light Fantastic
QuestData.Description: The Razaani ethereals have been playing with some interesting technology at Razaan's Landing to the north.$B$BI'm sure they won't mind if you use this trap to take a few samples of their little pink floating light orbs? They're probably only for decoration anyway.$B$BThe trap has a special property to it that when opened should attract one of the floating balls towards it. Of course, it'll probably also alert the Razaani to your presence.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Light Trap to collect 15 Razaani Light Orbs.
QuestData.CompletionText: I take it that since we're speaking, you have the light orbs from the Razaan's Landing? It'll be interesting to take a look at them and see what the ethereal are up to.
QuestData.RewardText: Hey! Wait just one damned minute!!$B$BThis doesn't look good...
